title: hilfiger_ads
desc: Integrating 3D product renders in live-action footage for viral Instagram marketing.

title: pool_rooms
desc: Exploring the aesthetics of the "Pool Rooms" using procedural modeling in Houdini. Custom water and caustic shaders created in Blender.

title: skull_rocket
desc: Smoke, explosion and debris simulation in Houdini. Terrain made using heightfields and procedural textures. Rendered using Solaris USD and Karma.

title: Trusty's Corner
desc: Personal media review website/blog written in Vue.js with flask backend

title: the_abyss
desc: Large scale smoke and destruction effects in Houdini. Building destruction setups developed by a small team

title: die_zweite_welle
desc: Large scale water and destruction effects.

title: novembre
desc: Developed and animated a complete Iphone messaging interface, controlled programmatically in After Effects. Assisted Arno Ringoet in the creation of computer UI elements

title: theodosia
desc: Developed smoke creature setup in Houdini. Worked closely with the comp team to lookdev the final design.

title: louis
desc: End of year school group project, developed over 3 months with a team of 5 artists

title: Light painter
desc: Lighting helper script written in PyMel. Easily light a scene by simply clicking on the area of the object

title: Skeleton rig
desc: Model completely rigged in Maya with modern features. Comes with a fully-fledged bone picker script. Rendered in Blender

title: spider_walker
desc: Research project aimed at implementing a naive solution for automatic foot placement in Houdini. Written in VEX

title: shrine_sculpt
desc: Zbrush sculpt based on artwork by Maeve B. Base modeled in Blender and finalized in Zbrush

title: invisible_sphere
desc: Series of Houdini simulations themed around revealing an invisible ball

title: frost_prime
desc: Creating greenscreen scenes and alerts for twitch streamer FrostPrime from 2018 to 2024

title: OneFox branding
desc: Creating into sequences and on-brand lower-thirds for youtube channel
